content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1603127510483{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1605634635947{padding-top: 250px !important;padding-bottom: 250px !important;background-image: url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/http://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/about_us_img5.jpg?id=6990) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″]

[vc_column_text]

WHO WE ARE?

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text el_class=”ptext”]Digital software lab’s perception always follows the new trend and generate unique ideas for innovations. Our ideology is focused on creativity and enthusiastic pioneers of digital forums. We always prefer multi-talented and passionate people, for contributing them to us.

We incline toward ability over the reference, which is the primary characteristic of our success. Our Team Members and the executives do not endure carelessness, as they own their work impeccably. The mind behind the Digital Software Labs is experienced employees, which offer their best to the clients since our fundamental objective is consumer loyalty.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1456226551654{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″]
[vc_column_text]

OUR MISSION

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text el_class=”ptext”]We want to help businesses to reach their desired goal and create as much revenue they can. Moreover, we give your customer that “YES THIS IS WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR” when they explore your updated portal.[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text]

OUR VISION

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text el_class=”ptext”]We assist clients by our digital strategies, who make excellent business campaigns regarding, all kinds of businesses ranging from a street food shop to a proper retailed business.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1456302588222{padding-top: 250px !important;padding-bottom: 250px !important;background-image: url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/http://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/about_us_img4.jpg?id=6988) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1456226492361{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1605634869397{padding-top: 250px !important;padding-bottom: 250px !important;background-image: url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/http://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/about_us_img5.jpg?id=6990) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″]
[vc_column_text]

OUR TEAM

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text el_class=”ptext”]Our designer group is remarkable and conveys the spectacular, easy to understand the final product, suitable design for every digital platform, and brings promising, productive outcomes.

We have one of the best content team which provides the freshly brewed content that engages the reader to read more deliberately than ever.

Digital Marketing and media experts can take your business tremendously successful, increase online publicity, support leads and transformations, drive traffic. We are advanced specialists in PPC, SEO, Social Media, and Content Marketing to give powerful arrangements.

Committed account and administration experts are there to give phenomenal client support, brief about corporate administrations, items and guarantee consumer loyalty and customer maintenance.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1665419178067{margin-top: 12px !important;margin-bottom: 12px !important;border-top-width: 12px !important;border-bottom-width: 12px !important;padding-top: 12px !important;padding-bottom: 12px !important;}”][vc_empty_space]
Andy Roberts
Project Manager
andyroberts@digitalsoftwarelabs.com
Henry Anderson
Project Manager
henry@digitalsoftwarelabs.com
Rolex David
Sr. Executive Sales
Steven Baker
Sr. Executive Sales
Alan Herb
Sr. Executive Sales
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
Rhonda Harris
CO-FOUNDER AND DIRECTOR

As a Co-Founder of Digital Software Labs, I make sure that the vision and goal of the company are fulfilled without facing any mismanagement regarding any issue.

Jadelyn Wang
CO-FOUNDER AND DIRECTOR

As a Director of  Digital Software Labs, My job is to make sure that the leads that are generated should be entertained properly to assist our customers with their client satisfaction strategy.

Donald Ceaser
CO-FOUNDER AND CEO

It is my responsibility to situate ourselves as a worldwide innovation brand that conveys extraordinary client assistance and offers manageable benefit to our clients.

Mary Louise
OPERATION EXECUTIVE

As an Operations Executive, My operations strategies and objectives make sure that the company reaches its target and operates effectively.

Rosa Hernandez
GRAPHIC DESIGNER AND ANIMATOR

Our Designing Department works with clients and production team members to establish project goals, create storyboards, design, and redefine animations.

Kelly Robinson
CONTENT WRITER

As a Content Writer, I produce relevant content for websites, blogs, articles, product descriptions, and social media platforms and create content that is specifically crafted to capture the attention of a particular target audience.

Joy Rosenthal
SENIOR SEO SPECIALIST

Our SEO Specialist finds the most popular and relevant keywords used in search engine queries and inserts them into websites, helping search engines find those sites and display them to web users.

Samantha Ellis
TEAM LEAD

As an enthusiastic Team Lead, I make sure that employees know how to respond to what is being asked and do so in a manner that puts the company in a good light.

Jonathan Dean Griffin
IT SPECIALIST

My job is to monitor the company’s computer systems, assess and troubleshoot errors and lag, and update and upgrade systems according to the needs.

James Avery
WEB DEVELOPER

As a responsible Web Developer, It is my duty to create innovative design and layout of the website, and building a website from concept all the way to completion from the bottom up, fashioning everything from the home page to site layout and function.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” disable_custom_paddings_tablet=”true” disable_custom_paddings_mobile=”true” el_class=”no-padding-quick”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Our Core Values

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner disable_custom_paddings_tablet=”true” disable_custom_paddings_mobile=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603217390127{margin-right: 32px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]


[vc_column_text]

DIVERSITY:

Our belief is in the beauty of diversity. We know how it helps to build up a strength that makes the impossible possible. [/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_column_text]

IMPACT:

We think the only limit to our impact is our vision and responsibility because that is what we are. [/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_column_text]

TEAMWORK:

We consider trust as the most important aspect of the company so we focus on teamwork to build trust among all.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_column_text]

COMMITMENT TO CLIENTS:

Our priority is to satisfy the client by providing the services they need as we believe happy customers are the reason for our growth.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1603126022643{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”video_button” css=”.vc_custom_1605634669774{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
[vc_empty_space height=”220px”][vc_column_text]

The right team for your project

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

we love what we do

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]


[vc_empty_space height=”230px”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1461582579822{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background: #f0f3f2 url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/http://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/23-1.png?id=23082) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text]

CONNECT WITH US

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Please email us your questions regarding our services

[/vc_column_text]

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1601918768003{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    Our Technologies

    [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_images_carousel images=”25006,25004,25005,25003,25002,25001,25000,24999,24998,24997,24996,24995,24994″ img_size=”1300×1300″ onclick=”link_no” speed=”1500″ slides_per_view=”5″ autoplay=”yes” hide_pagination_control=”yes” hide_prev_next_buttons=”yes” partial_view=”yes” wrap=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605543839488{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
